overview: Tarun was shot during an extended residency in my mother's birthplace in Sarawak, Malaysian Borneo. The work is a reflection on the intergenerational impacts of migration, the discomfort of confronting ones own cultural heritage and the impossibility of crossing cultural divides. - Tiyan Baker
tagline: Reckoning and returning, homecoming and belonging, ghosts and grace, the word for place is jungle.
title: Tarun
